common.enterEmailForReset: Andika aderesi yawe ya imeyili kandi tuzakumenyesha uko wasubiza ijambobanga ryawe
common.resetEmailSent: Uko wasubiza ijambobanga ryawe rwaherwe kuri imeyili yawe
common.invalidEmail: Nyamuneka andika aderesi yawe ya imeyili nziza
common.passwordTooShort: Ijambo ry'ibanga rigomba kuba rifite inyuguti 8 cyangwa hejuru
common.pleaseFixErrors: Nyamuneka vugurura amakosa mbere yo gukomeza
common.confirmSignupMessage: Urazi neza ko ushaka gukora konti nshya n'aya makuru?
common.invalidResetToken: Token yo kongera ushyireho ijambo ry'ibanga ntiyemewe cyangwa yararenga
common.invalidResetLink: Link yo kongera ushyireho ijambo ry'ibanga ntiyemewe
common.invalidResetLinkDesc: Iyi link yo kongera ushyireho ijambo ry'ibanga ntiyemewe cyangwa yararenga. Nyamuneka saba link nshya yo kongera ushyireho ijambo ry'ibanga.

dashboard.title: Ikibaho
dashboard.topSelling: Ibyiciro bigurwa cyane mu kwezi gushize
dashboard.currentInventory: Ingano y'ibicuruzwa bihari ubu bukurikije icyiciro

admin.title: Ikibaho cy'Umuyobozi
admin.subtitle: Gucunga sisitemu yawe, abakoresha, n'ibicuruzwa.
admin.noPermission: Nta burenganzira ufite bwo kugera kuri iyi paje.

hero.title: Gukurikiranwa kw'abacuruzi byoroshye kuri Abacuruzi bo mu Karere
hero.subtitle: Kurikiranwa n'ibicuruzwa, andika abacuruzi, gucunga amanzi, kandi ukore raporo hamwe na platform yoroshye yateguwe kugirango ikorane na business yawe.

features.title: Byose Ukeneye Kugirango Ucunge Iduka Ryawe
features.subtitle: Platform yacu iba ibikoresho byose ukeneye kugirango ucunge business yawe neza kandi wongere amafaranga yawe.

inventory.title: Gucunga Ibicuruzwa
inventory.description: Kurikiranwa n'ibicuruzwa byawe, kumenya igihe ibicuruzwa byawe biri hasi, kandi gucunga amakuru y'ibicuruzwa.

sales.title: Kurikiranwa n'Abacuruzi
sales.description: Andika byose by'ubucuruzi bwawe, harimo abacuruzi b'inkweto na b'amanzi, hamwe na interface yoroshye.

debts.title: Gucunga Amanzi
debts.description: Kurikiranwa n'amanzi y'abakiriya, shiraho igihe cyo kwishyura, kandi wakirire amakuru igihe amanzi atari yishyuwe.

suppliers.title: Gucunga Abatanga Ibicuruzwa
suppliers.description: Bika urutonde rw'abatanga ibicuruzwa bawe, kurikiranwa n'ibyo ordera, kandi gucunga ubufatanye mu giti cye.

reports.title: Raporo na Analytics
reports.description: Kora raporo za buri munsi, buri cyumweru, na buri kwezi kugirango urikire imikorere ya business yawe kandi ufate ibyemezo by'ingenzi.

profit.title: Kurikiranwa n'Amafaranga
profit.description: Rikira amafaranga yawe n'akababaro hamwe na raporo z'ibyishimo zifasha kumenya amahirwe yo kwaguka.

testimonials.title: Byizewe na Abacuruzi bo mu Karere
testimonials.subtitle: Shyira hamwe na magana y'abacuruzi bafite iduka bafashe guhindura business zabo na platform yacu.

testimonial1.name: Sarah Anderson
testimonial1.text: ShopSmart yahindutse cyane uko nkoresha iduka ryanjye ry'amakuru. Ubu nshobora kurikiranwa n'ibicuruzwa n'abacuruzi mu gihe cy'ukuri, byakuyeho ibyangiritse kandi byongeyeho amafaranga yanjye.

testimonial2.name: Michael Johnson
testimonial2.text: Umumaro wo kurikiranwa n'amanzi warihuse cyane business yanjye. Sinzi nongera kwibwira kuri amanzi y'abakiriya, kandi amakuru yo kwishyura ari ngombwa cyane.

testimonial3.name: Lisa Patel
testimonial3.text: Raporo za buri kwezi zifasha kumenya ibicuruzwa byiza n'ibibi. Izi data zanfashije gufata ibyemezo by'ingenzi byo kugura kandi kongera business yanjye.

cta.title: Witeguye Guhindura Business Yawe?
cta.subtitle: Shyira hamwe na ibihumbi by'abacuruzi bakoresha platform yacu kugirango bakore business zabo kandi bongere amafaranga.

footer.description: Gufasha abacuruzi bo mu karere hamwe na solisiyo z'ingenzi zo gucunga ibicuruzwa n'abacuruzi.
